9#ifndef V8_WASM_WASM_SUBTYPING_H_
10#define V8_WASM_WASM_SUBTYPING_H_

12#include "src/wasm/value-type.h"
13
14namespace v8::internal::wasm {
15
16struct WasmModule;
17
18V8_NOINLINE V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE bool IsSubtypeOfImpl(
19 ValueType subtype, ValueType supertype, const WasmModule* sub_module,
20 const WasmModule* super_module);
21V8_NOINLINE V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE bool IsHeapSubtypeOfImpl(
22 HeapType sub_heap, HeapType super_heap, const WasmModule* sub_module,
23 const WasmModule* super_module);
24
25// Checks if type1, defined in module1, is equivalent with type2, defined in
26// module2.
27// Type equivalence (~) is described by the following rules:
28// - Two numeric types are equivalent iff they are equal.
29// - T(ht1) ~ T(ht2) iff ht1 ~ ht2 for T in {ref, ref null, rtt}.
30// Equivalence of heap types ht1 ~ ht2 is defined as follows:
31// - Two non-index heap types are equivalent iff they are equal.
32// - Two indexed heap types are equivalent iff they are iso-recursive
33// equivalent.
34V8_NOINLINE V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE bool EquivalentTypes(ValueType type1,
35 ValueType type2,
36 const WasmModule* module1,
37 const WasmModule* module2);
38
39// Checks if {subtype}, defined in {module1}, is a subtype of {supertype},
40// defined in {module2}.
41// Subtyping between value types is described by the following rules
42// (structural subtyping):
43// - numeric types are subtype-related iff they are equal.
44// - (ref null ht1) <: (ref null ht2) iff ht1 <: ht2.
45// - (ref ht1) <: (ref null? ht2) iff ht1 <: ht2.
46// - rtt1 <: rtt2 iff rtt1 ~ rtt2.
47// For heap types, the following subtyping rules hold:
48// - The abstract heap types form the following type hierarchies:
49//
50// any func extern
51// / \ | |
52// eq \ nofunc noextern
53// / | \ \
54// i31 array struct string
55// \___|______|_____/
56// |
57// none
58//
59// - All functions are subtypes of func.
60// - All structs are subtypes of struct.
61// - All arrays are subtypes of array.
62// - An indexed heap type h1 is a subtype of indexed heap type h2 if h2 is
63// transitively an explicit canonical supertype of h1.
64// Note that {any} includes references introduced by the host which belong to
65// none of any's subtypes (e.g. JS objects).
66V8_INLINE bool IsSubtypeOf(ValueType subtype, ValueType supertype,
67 const WasmModule* sub_module,
68 const WasmModule* super_module) {
69 if (subtype == supertype && sub_module == super_module) return true;
70 return IsSubtypeOfImpl(subtype, supertype, sub_module, super_module);
71}
72
73// Checks if {subtype} is a subtype of {supertype} (both defined in {module}).
74V8_INLINE bool IsSubtypeOf(ValueType subtype, ValueType supertype,
75 const WasmModule* module) {
76 // If the types are trivially identical, exit early.
77 if (V8_LIKELY(subtype == supertype)) return true;
78 return IsSubtypeOfImpl(subtype, supertype, module, module);
79}
80
81V8_INLINE bool TypesUnrelated(ValueType type1, ValueType type2,
82 const WasmModule* module1,
83 const WasmModule* module2) {
84 return !IsSubtypeOf(type1, type2, module1, module2) &&
85 !IsSubtypeOf(type2, type1, module2, module1);
86}
87
88V8_INLINE bool IsHeapSubtypeOf(HeapType subtype, HeapType supertype,
89 const WasmModule* sub_module,
90 const WasmModule* super_module) {
91 if (subtype == supertype && sub_module == super_module) return true;
92 return IsHeapSubtypeOfImpl(subtype, supertype, sub_module, super_module);
93}
94
95// Checks if {subtype} is a subtype of {supertype} (both defined in {module}).
96V8_INLINE bool IsHeapSubtypeOf(HeapType subtype, HeapType supertype,
97 const WasmModule* module) {
98 // If the types are trivially identical, exit early.
99 if (V8_LIKELY(subtype == supertype)) return true;
100 return IsHeapSubtypeOfImpl(subtype, supertype, module, module);
101}
102
103V8_INLINE bool HeapTypesUnrelated(HeapType heap1, HeapType heap2,
104 const WasmModule* module1,
105 const WasmModule* module2) {
106 return !IsHeapSubtypeOf(heap1, heap2, module1, module2) &&
107 !IsHeapSubtypeOf(heap2, heap1, module2, module1);
108}
109
110// Checks whether {subtype_index} is valid as a declared subtype of
111// {supertype_index}.
112// - Both type must be of the same kind (function, struct, or array).
113// - Both type must have the same {is_shared} flag.
114// - Structs: Subtype must have at least as many fields as supertype,
115// covariance for respective immutable fields, equivalence for respective
116// mutable fields.
117// - Arrays: subtyping of respective element types for immutable arrays,
118// equivalence of element types for mutable arrays.
119// - Functions: equal number of parameter and return types. Contravariance for
120// respective parameter types, covariance for respective return types.
121V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE bool ValidSubtypeDefinition(uint32_t subtype_index,
122 uint32_t supertype_index,
123 const WasmModule* sub_module,
124 const WasmModule* super_module);
125
126V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE bool IsShared(ValueType type, const WasmModule* module);
127
128struct TypeInModule {
129 ValueType type;
130 const WasmModule* module;
131
132 TypeInModule(ValueType type, const WasmModule* module)
133 : type(type), module(module) {}
134
135 TypeInModule() : TypeInModule(kWasmBottom, nullptr) {}
136
137 bool operator==(const TypeInModule& other) const {
138 return type == other.type && module == other.module;
139 }
140
141 bool operator!=(const TypeInModule& other) const {
142 return type != other.type || module != other.module;
143 }
144};
145
146inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& oss, TypeInModule type) {
147 return oss << type.type.name() << "@"
148 << reinterpret_cast<intptr_t>(type.module);
149}
150
151// Returns {kWasmBottom} if the union of {type1} and {type2} is not defined.
152V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE TypeInModule Union(ValueType type1, ValueType type2,
153 const WasmModule* module1,
154 const WasmModule* module2);
155
156V8_INLINE V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE TypeInModule Union(TypeInModule type1,
157 TypeInModule type2) {
158 return Union(type1.type, type2.type, type1.module, type2.module);
159}
160
161V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE TypeInModule Intersection(ValueType type1, ValueType type2,
162 const WasmModule* module1,
163 const WasmModule* module2);
164
165V8_INLINE V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE TypeInModule Intersection(TypeInModule type1,
166 TypeInModule type2) {
167 return Intersection(type1.type, type2.type, type1.module, type2.module);
168}
169
170// Returns the matching abstract null type (none, nofunc, noextern).
171ValueType ToNullSentinel(TypeInModule type);
172
173// Returns if two types share the same type hierarchy (any, extern, funcref).
174bool IsSameTypeHierarchy(HeapType type1, HeapType type2,
175 const WasmModule* module);
176
177} // namespace v8::internal::wasm
178
179#endif // V8_WASM_WASM_SUBTYPING_H_
